Subject: Missing USB Storage Device in List of Devices
Description: Initial situation: A USB storage device was whitelisted locally on a computer. However, whitelisting is not functional. Workaround implemented: The USB storage device was deleted from the device list. Delete time: Monday morning, February 24, 2025. Whitelisting was done manually via Adding New Device (VID, PID, Serial Number) and is now functional! --> see screenshot "MMUC1050156_USB Storage Device_whitelisted.jpg". Whitelisting time: Tuesday morning, February 25, 2025. Issue: Since then, the deleted USB storage device no longer appears in the device list! The USB storage device is, however, displayed in the Logs Report. --> see logfiles "EP_Reporting_and_Administration_Tool_USB_Storage_Device_20D11E8010C1.xlsx". Question: Do devices that have been deleted from the list generally no longer appear in the device list? Expectation: Please check why the USB storage device is not listed in the device list. Please make sure that deleted devices are listed again. Thank you for your support.
What_We_Know__c:
Found device 10EC | 5261 | 00000001004CE00000  has a right assigned before 6th or March.
---
Found the device was not connected to a computer after fixing the issue.
--------------
- issue could not be reproduced by QA
- Dev intervention required to clear the database tables (possible solution)
Next_Steps__c:
Asked the customer to remove the rights from the 10EC | 5261 | 00000001004CE00000  device then reasigne them only if the last see time is more that 6th March 
------
Asked the customer to connect the device and confirm if the device is visible.
-------------
- schedule troubleshooting session with the designated developer for this issue
Solution_Comment__c:
The customer confirmed the devices ar now visible.
And that they are ok to close this ticket.
